src_comments: The unique identifier for the recipient in the state Medicaid program. Used as primary key for member records.
Date when this assignment record was last updated in the source system.
Current status of the member PCP assignment (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, PENDING).
The date when member coverage becomes effective under this enrollment.
The member first name or given name from case management.
The member family name or surname from the case file.
The main phone number used to contact the member.
Date when the member was terminated from coverage or disenrolled.
Member identifier on the claim - needs to join to member foundation to get surrogate key.
The plan identifier from enrollment - used to lookup the plan surrogate key from plan foundation.
Provider identifier that needs to be looked up in provider foundation to get PROV_SK.
Tenant or client code identifying the state/organization.
Code identifying the source system (e.g., MMIS, HIX).
The original member identifier from the source system.
Member identifier from Medicare Part A eligibility records.
Member identifier from Medicare Part B eligibility file.
Member identifier from Medicare Part D pharmacy benefits.
Total household income used for Medicaid eligibility determination.
Identifier for the caseworker assigned to manage this members case.
Geographic region code for managed care organization assignment.
Latitude coordinate of member residence for geographic analysis.
Longitude coordinate of member residence for geographic analysis.
NPI of the affiliated provider that needs lookup to get provider surrogate key.
Benefit plan identifier that maps to plan foundation.
